_sText:
Ok so this is the pre-beta version of my map battle_arena which is a map in wich players start with out weapons and then choose what weapons to fight with and are teleported to a room with just those weapons 

so far i only have the Knife and Awp arenas completed....i wanted to see how the community likes it before i go any further into the process 

at the moment because its a pre-beta theres only 2 spawns (1 T and 1 CT) just for testing purposes 

i will add more if requested 

i should have all the rooms done within 2 days and then it should take me another day or 2 of final touch-ups and the map (Version 1) should be complete 

i want to here your thoughts and opinions on how i should finish the map and what you like and didslike and anyway to make it better 

[EDIT]
When the first person goes through a teleport to a room all other teleports stop working and the letters above all other teleports break
